amendment.description: To provide for the suspension of the debate limitation on reconciliation legislation that causes a deficit or increases the deficit.

action.text: Amendment SA 2414 proposed by Senator Byrd.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2414.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2414 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 55. Record Vote Number: 296.
Amendment SA 2414 ruled out of order by the chair.
